body_html: Agreed, I've wanted this too. There are some annoying obstacles, since in some places we automatically convert singleton tensors to lists and this feature would be backwards incompatible, but we've had some internal discussion about removing that magical (and fairly unidiomatic) list conversion. If we did that, we'd be able to add your automatic conversion, which would be great.
body_text: Agreed, I've wanted this too.  There are some annoying obstacles, since in some places we automatically convert singleton tensors to lists and this feature would be backwards incompatible, but we've had some internal discussion about removing that magical (and fairly unidiomatic) list conversion.  If we did that, we'd be able to add your automatic conversion, which would be great.
body: Agreed, I've wanted this too.  There are some annoying obstacles, since in some places we automatically convert singleton tensors to lists and this feature would be backwards incompatible, but we've had some internal discussion about removing that magical (and fairly unidiomatic) list conversion.  If we did that, we'd be able to add _your_ automatic conversion, which would be great.
